p09_load_merge_batches¶

Phenotyping.p09_load_merge_batches(dir_name, file_name, pattern)¶

This function is to load files which are stored in batches and merge them into a dataframe

Parameters

  • dir_name (str) – directory name where files stored

  • file_name (str) – the prefix name of file which we want to merge

  • pattern (str) – file_name + pattern = the name of file which we want to merge

Returns

Dataframe generated by reading all files and merged

Return type

pandas.Dataframe

Previous topic

p08_get_dischg_position

Next topic

p09_merge_outputfile
